content: example knit with red heart soft yarn in teal gingerbread icing fingerless gloves 1 of 2 this pattern knits up quick to pattern repeat row row 30 p1 f&b p1 k1 p2 k1 p1 see chart on next page create chunky fingerless gloves p1 f&b k4 p1 k1 p2 k1 p1 that coordinate with the other row 4 p1 k4 p1 k1 p2 k1 3 times k4 44 st total gingerbread icing patterns 3 times p1 k4 row 31 p1 k1 p1 k4 p1 k1 p1 row 5 p1 k4 7 times k4 p1 6 times k4 44 st total needles us 7 4 5 mm double pointed needles row 6 p1 k4 p1 k1 p2 k1 row 32 p1 f&b k1 p1 k1 p2 k1 3 times p1 k4 p1 k1 p1 f&b k4 p1 k1 p2 k1 yarn approximately 100 yds worsted row 7 p1 k4 7 times p1 3 times k4 46 st total weight or slightly heavier works fine row 8 p1 k4 p1 k1 p2 k1 end increases gusset should have 12 3 times p1 k4 stitches for a total of 46 st per round gauge 5 stitches + 6 row = 1 inch in stockinette stitch row 9 p1 2/2 lc p1 k4 row 33 p1 k2 p1 k4 p1 k2 p1 3 times p1 2/2 lc 2/2 lc p1 k4 p1 3 times abbreviations 2/2 lc row 10-15 r epeat row 4 - 9 st stitch row 34 p2 k1 p1 k1 p2 k1 p1 k1 row 16-21 r epeat row 4 - 9 cn cable needle p2 k4 p1 k1 p2 k1 p1 3 times for a longer cuff repeat row 4 - 9 k knit stitch k4 one or two more times p purl stitch row 35 p1 k2 p1 k4 p1 k2 p2 decrease purl two stitches together p1 k4 p1 6 times k4 start thumb gusset at the same time gusset sts are in italic row 36 place first 12 st on a piece p1 f&b purl into the front and back of of waste yarn to hold them they row 22 p1 f&b k4 p1 k1 p2 the stitch to increase by 1 stitch will be worked later to complete k1 p1 3 times k4 36 st total 2/2 lc place 2 st on cn and hold in the thumb and cast on 1 st to front k2 place 2 st from cn onto left row 23 p2 k4 p1 6 times k4 start first row then continue in hand needle and k2 36 st total pattern k4 p1 k1 p2 k1 p1 3 row 24 p1 f&b twice k4 p1 k1 times k4 you should have 35 st on start p2 k1 p1 3 times k4 38 st total the needles again cast on 36 stitches place 10 st on first row 25 p1 k2 p1 k4 p1 needle 15 st on second needle and 11 st on third needle 6 times k4 38 st total continue
